post.text: A 15-year-old girl to Hillary: "I see with my own eyes the damage Donald Trump does when he talks about women and how they look. As the first female president, how would you undo some of that damage and help girls understand that they are so much more than just what they look like?" Watch Hillary's response.

comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: Dankbaar voor de vraag xx Delphine Jeffrey Jens Margaret

replies.author: Margaret
replies.text: Thaaaank yooooouuu! Helaas geen antwoord op het meisje haar vraag, ma jaaaaaaaa

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: de kunst van het nietszeggen is ook een kunst xx
